objects.name: TrickBot Yara Rule
objects.description: This is an IoC for TrickBot
objects.pattern: [ yara-rule:value = 'rule MALW_dllinject_trickbot_module : Trojan { meta: author = "Marc Salinas @Bondey_m" description = " Detects dllinject module from Trickbot Trojan" strings: $str_dllinj_01 = "user_pref(" $str_dllinj_02 = "" $str_dllinj_03 = "" $str_dllinj_04 = "" condition: all of ($str_ dllinj_*) }' ]
